param.query:
SELECT 
	a.cust_id,
	a.rank,
	a.sum,
	a.cum_sales,
	a.tot_sales,
	round(a.sum/a.tot_sales*100, 4) rto,
	round(a.cum_sales/a.tot_sales*100, 4) cum_rto
FROM(
	SELECT
  		a.cust_id,
  		rank() over(order by a.sum desc) rank,
  		sum,
  		sum(a.sum) over(order by a.sum desc) cum_sales,
  		sum(a.sum) over() tot_sales
  	FROM #{DF(0)} a
 ) a;

param.query:
SELECT 
	a.ctg_1,
	a.ctg_2,
	a.rank,
	a.sum,
	a.cum_sales,
	a.tot_sales,
	round(a.sum/a.tot_sales, 4) rto,
	round(a.cum_sales/a.tot_sales, 4) cum_rto
FROM(
	SELECT
  		a.ctg_1,
  		a.ctg_2,
  		rank() over(partition by ctg_1 order by a.sum desc) rank,
  		sum,
  		sum(a.sum) over(partition by ctg_1 order by a.sum desc) cum_sales,
  		sum(a.sum) over(partition by ctg_1) tot_sales
  	FROM #{DF(0)} a
) a
